name: stellar-xlm-blinks-backend
description: Backend service for Stellar XLM transfer Blinks following Dialect specification

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:check
scripts.build:clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning build artifacts...' && rm -rf dist/ build/ .nyc_output/ coverage/
scripts.build:check: echo '🔍 Checking code quality...' && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.lint: echo '📝 Linting code...' && node -c server.js && node -c routes/actions/transfer-xlm.js && node -c services/stellar-xlm-service.js && node -c config/stellar-config.js
scripts.type-check: echo '🔍 Type checking...' && node -c server.js && node -c routes/actions/transfer-xlm.js && node -c services/stellar-xlm-service.js && node -c config/stellar-config.js
scripts.test:coverage: echo '📊 Running tests with coverage...' && npm test
scripts.deploy:check: npm run validate && echo '🚀 Ready for deployment!'
